name: The Mummy Boy - Adventure Game
description:
Try to help The Mummy Boy to get as far as possible in this world of adventure.

It's an amazing adventure game. Full of action and entertainment.

Play and Challenge your friends.

Features:
=======
- Endless game.
- Colourful HD game scene.
- Challenge your friends.
- Easy to play.

So are you ready for beat me?
